column2: Freq: Prior to start of works
Ref docs: TAS-A-AUD-6007-0426 – LANDSCAPE (IFC) & TAS-HWW-SDL-ZWD-SPC-AUD-SDU-A0010-00 – Section 0433 Stone Cladding
• Has the structure been surveyed, including any fixing inserts, before commencement?
Freq: Prior to start of works
• Is the structure clear of dirt and blemishes?
Freq: Prior to start of works
• Have stone cladding fixings been provided as required, sufficient to support, restrain and resist the structural design loads on each cladding panel, as specified?
• Have adhesives been applied where required, as specified?
• Has cladding been installed as described in specification, considering given tolerances?
Date NCR closed for this lot
